The Ministry of Horticulture is a Ministry of the Government of Maharashtra
state.
The Ministry is headed by a cabinet level Minister. Bharatshet Gogawale is Current Minister of Horticulture Government of Maharashtra.
Head office
मंत्री फलोत्पादन विभाग
